3rdLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Blinding Smite
3rdLevelPaladinSpells.Description: The next time you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack during the spell's duration, your weapon flares with a bright light, and the attack deals an extra 3d8 radiant damage.

3rdLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Create Food and Water
3rdLevelPaladinSpells.Description: You create 45 pounds of food and 30 gallons of water on the ground or in containers within range, enough to sustain up to fifteen humanoids or five steeds for 24 hours.

3rdLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Crusader's Mantle
3rdLevelPaladinSpells.Description: Holy power radiates from you in an aura with a 30-foot radius, awakening boldness in friendly creatures. The aura moves with you, centered on you.

3rdLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Daylight
3rdLevelPaladinSpells.Description: A 60-foot-radius sphere of light spreads out from a point you choose within range.

3rdLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Dispel Magic
3rdLevelPaladinSpells.Description: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends.

3rdLevelPaladinSpells.Name: Magic Circle
3rdLevelPaladinSpells.Description: You create a 10-foot-radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder of magical energy centered on a point on the ground that you can see within range.
